abstract: Media producer Nicole A Childers shares lesson of self-reliance that was forced upon her when her foster family abandoned her the day after high school graduation; recalls intervention of others saved her from homelessness and losing the opportunity of an Ivy league education; concludes that she learned then to save a financial cushion for hard times and always have a backup plan.
lead_paragraph: The day after graduating from high school, a foster child was on her own. Ever since, she has saved — and been her own backup plan.

headline.main: A Teenager’s Harsh Lesson Is an Adult’s Buffer
headline.print_headline: A Teenager’s Harsh Lesson Is an Adult’s Buffer

snippet: The day after graduating from high school, a foster child was on her own. Ever since, she has saved — and been her own backup plan.
